definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: Skilled in the repair and maintenance of refrigeration systems and cold rooms.
sentences.chinese: 精通冷冻系统和冷藏室的维修和保养工作。

sentences.english: Lyophilization(freeze-drying) is the most commonly used method for preparing solid protein pharmaceuticals.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻干燥技术是制备固体蛋白质药品的常用方法。

sentences.english: Hydrogen nis also one of the coolest refrigerants.
sentences.chinese: 氢是温度最低的冷冻剂。

sentences.english: Under today's medical definition, yes. But the definition of cryonics.
sentences.chinese: 按照今天的医学定义，是的，但是根据人体冷冻学。

sentences.english: Exclusive distribution of "HIESTAND Swiss Gourmet Bakery" leader in frozen premium good.
sentences.chinese: 的独家经销商，优质冷冻产品的龙头企业。

sentences.english: Sprays of liquid nitrogen freeze and kill the abnormal tissue, which sloughs off.
sentences.chinese: 用液氮喷洒冷冻，杀死异常组织，它会脱落。

sentences.english: Malondialdehyde(MDA) consistency in rats serum was measured when performing cryotherapy by means of fluorescence method.
sentences.chinese: 采用荧光法测定大鼠冷冻前后血清MDA浓度。

sentences.english: This aquarium tank from the ice structure, ornamental fish frozen in the inside.
sentences.chinese: 这种水族缸由冰块构成，观赏鱼被冷冻在了里面。

sentences.english: Why not call it the Big Chill or the Nippy era?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不管这叫“大寒”或者“冷冻时代”？

sentences.english: A fishing trawler unloads crates of frozen fish.
sentences.chinese: 渔船在码头卸下的一箱箱冷冻海鱼。

sentences.english: O neg and fresh frozen on the way?
sentences.chinese: 负O型血和新鲜冷冻血浆到了吗？

sentences.english: The rolls are made of chilled alloy cast iron with wear-resistant hard surface.
sentences.chinese: 该卷制成的冷冻合金铸铁与耐磨材料坚硬表面。

sentences.english: You had better refrigerate the beer before drinking it.
sentences.chinese: 喝啤酒前你最好先把它冷冻一下。

sentences.english: Hapag-Lloyd is also the 2nd largest provider of containerized reefer capacity in the world.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯罗特也是世界第二大冷冻集装箱运输服务提供者。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of cryotherapy for infantile hemangioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨冷冻治疗小儿血管瘤的有效性。

sentences.english: Cryonics is still in its youth.
sentences.chinese: 人体冷冻学还处于初始阶段。

definition: refrigeration/cold storage/to keep (food, medicine) in cold environment
to melt/to thaw/to defrost/fig. to relax (repression, enmity etc)
to slice/slice/thin section of a specimen (for microscopic examination)
